subject: Add large-paste handling in input (web+terminal)
description: Implement large-paste handling (web+terminal): when paste exceeds threshold, replace visible input with placeholder like 'Pasted 1,234 words / 8,901 chars' but keep raw payload for submit. Avoid Codex-style bug where placeholder replaces the payload and breaks slash commands. Provide preview/expand + cancel. Add tests for paste + submit correctness.
